title: Automated ICD Coding via Contrastive Learning With Back-Reference and Synonym Knowledge for Smart Self-Diagnosis Applications

abstract: Smart applications are essential in intelligent consumer electronics. With the rising focus on health concerns, self-diagnosis applications on smart devices have gained widespread popularity, attracting significant attention from both consumers and …
